resources.string: Android application for tracking the COVID-19 outbreak around the world with [coronavirus-tracker](https://github.com/ExpDev07/coronavirus-tracker-api) API.

* RxAndroid
 * Retrofit
 * Android Maps Utils
 * MPAndroidChart
 * MaterialDrawer
 * ThreeTenABP
 * Markwon
